import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Button, Form } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux'; import { addProduct } from '../../JS/Actions/product'; const AddProduct = () => { const [newProduct, setNewProduct] = useState({}); const dispatch = useDispatch(); const handleChange = (e) => { setNewProduct({ ...newProduct, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; const add = () => { dispatch(addProduct(newProduct)); window.location.reload(); }; return (

Contact Us
) } export default AddProduct
